channel.title: How to make a 1hp command on a 317?
channel.description: How would I make a 1hp command for a 317?

item.title: How to make a 1hp command on a 317?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“itai, post:3, topic:335813”] skillLevel[3] = 1;//Or something along those lines
skillLevel isn’t a variable on delta. Do you know what is?[/quote]

No, but look around in the commands for “pure” or “master” or something along those lines, find the variable thats referenced there and just copy the referenced [] and insert the value at iundex 3(hitpoints) to 1.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a 1hp command on a 317?

 skillLevel[3] = 1;//Or something along those lines

item.title: How to make a 1hp command on a 317?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

if(command[0].equals("health")) { int health = Integer.parseInt(command[1]); player.setCurrentHealth(health); }

Or if you’re using wL base:

if(command.startsWith("health")) { int health = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(command.indexOf(" "))); skillLevel[3] = 1;//Or something along those lines }

Read full topic
